titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on cis, trans-3-(2-chloro-3,3,3 triflouro-1-propenyl)-2,2-dimethyl-cyclopropane carboxylic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/9/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on a specified chemical.
